channel.title: CiTR -- Samsquantch's Hideaway
channel.description: host: anita bee genre: rock/pop anitabinder@hotmail.com
channel.itunes:summary: host: anita bee genre: rock/pop anitabinder@hotmail.com
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: All-canadian music with a focus on indie-rock/pop.

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Oct-2014
item.itunes:subtitle: kc royals for the win! 1-1 world series

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Sep-2014
item.itunes:subtitle: detroit tigers clinch a playoff spot!

item.title: Broadcast on 13-Aug-2014
item.description: Tonight is a special episode of Samsquantch's Hideaway. The lovely Michelle Hanley of Kingsgate Mall twitter fame @kingsgatemall joins as co-host. Super fun fact: she is an ex-student of mine, Social Studies 10 to be exact.
item.itunes:subtitle: me 'n' michelle!

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Jun-2014
item.itunes:subtitle: the longest s.h. day of the year

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Apr-2014
item.description: my first band interview! evan october & matt shatters (aka satchel rage) join me in studio to discuss new album, 'the first four seasons' and fill us all in on the history of this vancouver baseball punk band.
item.itunes:subtitle: THE ISOTOPES IN STUDIO!

item.title: Broadcast on 19-Jun-2013
item.itunes:subtitle: the longest day of samsquantch's hideaway

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Apr-2013
item.description: sorry, no canned hamm on tonight's show. i'll try for next show.
item.itunes:subtitle: do they need a medium hamm?

item.title: Broadcast on 05-Dec-2012
item.itunes:subtitle: been a long time, been a long, lonely, lonely, lonely, lone-leee time

item.title: Broadcast on 23-May-2012
item.itunes:subtitle: i love val (but not like that!)

item.title: Broadcast on 09-May-2012
item.itunes:subtitle: R.I.P. Todd Simko (Pure) & Adam Yauch (Beastie Boys)

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Apr-2012
item.itunes:subtitle: happy 12th b-day, dweezil, my lovely shih-tzon

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Feb-2012
item.itunes:subtitle: united we stand, divided we fall

item.title: Broadcast on 23-Nov-2011
item.description: what a treat!
item.itunes:subtitle: another Long John Tanner fill-in!

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Nov-2011
item.description:
Long John Tanner has Susanne Tabata and Randy Rampage in studio with him PLUS phone interviews with Gerry Hannah and Nick Jones.
He'll be back in two weeks (Wed, Nov 23rd) with Grant McDonagh, Gary Taylor and Buck Cherry.
item.itunes:subtitle: legendary dj, LONG JOHN TANNER fills in!

item.title: Broadcast on 12-Oct-2011
item.description: to celebrate mint record's 20th birthday, local author, kaitlin fontana has released a book celebrating the first two decades of the label - Fresh at Twenty: The Oral History of Mint Records. i talk a little about the contents and play an all-mint show.
item.itunes:subtitle: happy 20th birthday, mint!

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Sep-2011
item.itunes:subtitle: i wish modest mouse were canadian

item.title: Broadcast on 06-Jul-2011
item.itunes:subtitle: a crispy start to the summer

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Apr-2011
item.itunes:subtitle: will the real spring stand up, please?

item.title: Broadcast on 02-Feb-2011
item.itunes:subtitle: wiarton willie did not see his shadow = early spring!

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Oct-2010
item.itunes:subtitle: helloween is coming... the flowers are dying and the spirits are awaking

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Sep-2010
item.description:
Here's John Tanner's email to me prior to the show:
"I've been wanting to feature Susanne Tabata and music from her latest Documentary "Bloodied But Unbowed" about the local punk rock scene. Randy Rampage would probably join us."
And after... "Hi Anita. Had a crazy time with your show this evening!"
item.itunes:subtitle: Long John Tanner does a special Fill-in

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Aug-2010
item.description: lots of new music including arcade fire, wolf parade, the nymphets and the provincial archive.
item.itunes:subtitle: purple & white petunias

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Apr-2010
item.description: since my last show, devon clifford, drummer for you say party! we say die! died in the middle of their homecoming show at the rickshaw here in vancouver... he died doing something he loved. r.i.p.
item.itunes:subtitle: devon clifford: 1979-2010

item.title: Broadcast on 02-Apr-2010
item.description: anita bee tries her hand @ ska!
item.itunes:subtitle: fill-in: ska-t's scenic drive

item.title: Broadcast on 23-Dec-2009
item.itunes:subtitle: Anita Bee's Top 10 Vancouver Bands of the Decade

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Jan-2009
item.itunes:subtitle: in the dead of the winter

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Dec-2008
item.description: every other song is a x-mas song from canned hamm and friends' 2007 album, 'sincerely christmas'. it doesn't get any better than this!
item.itunes:subtitle: ho ho ho!

item.title: Broadcast on 13-Aug-2008
item.description: yeah, i'm gettin' old. hear all about it. some music from the late 70s keeps in line with this theme.
item.itunes:subtitle: time keeps on slippin'...

item.title: Broadcast on 30-Jul-2008
item.description: listen to the chaos that ensues when a dj brings her 2 very small kids to the station to do her show! let's hope daddy doesn't work the afternoon shift again anytime soon!
item.itunes:subtitle: chaos with the kids!

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Jul-2008
item.description: what a ball i had! i got to play ska music for a whole 2 hours. it was an honor to fill mr. t's shoes. it was a refreshing change.
item.itunes:subtitle: ska-t's scen-ik drive show swap!

item.title: 23 July 2008
item.itunes:subtitle: DJ Bleek hosts the Hideaway this week!

item.title: Broadcast on 30-Apr-2008
item.description: i actually brought the toddler and newborn into the studio with me. hear the mayhem! not something you hear a lot at citr.
item.itunes:subtitle: first post-birth show!

item.title: Broadcast on 19-Mar-2008
item.description: i'll be coming back from my 'dj mat leave' wed, apr 30th 6:30 to 8 pm as the mother of 2! yikes! wish me luck!
item.itunes:subtitle: my last show before baby comes!

item.title: Broadcast on 19-Dec-2007
item.description: tons of new x-mas canned hamm! mmmmm, yum! merry x-mas and happy new year.
item.itunes:subtitle: X-Mas Show

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Aug-2007
item.description: a smattering of cdn music through the decades.

item.title: Broadcast on 23-May-2007
item.description: all about the good times. i quite enjoyed myself this evening =)
item.itunes:subtitle: our canadian musical journey

item.title: Broadcast on 11-Apr-2007
item.description: some new arcade fire and some old shadowy men...
item.itunes:subtitle: happy spring!

item.title: Broadcast on 31-Jan-2007
item.description: more good-time canadian tunes incl a couple "hip-hop"ers (and not swollen members or maestro fresh wes). let your backbone slide NOT!

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Dec-2006
item.description: happy holidays!

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Nov-2006
item.description: and sometimes why joins forces w/ samsquantch's hideway to give you canadian girl music!
item.itunes:subtitle: miko & anita bee together
